'''Outfit Teasers''' are videos released by official ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' social media accounts that feature cinematic previews of newly released [[Character Outfit]]s. They are available as a [https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqWr7dyJNgLLJB-ylX1s5JLxHMB9jeX9k playlist] on the official Genshin Impact YouTube channel.
